long_description: This Easton EA50 stem delivers a sturdy, stable interface thanks to an optimized clamping interface and strong aluminum construction, all at a great value. DST (Distributed Stress Technology) reduces stem clamping stress by distributing force more evenly across the handlebar's clamping section. Top-Lock technology allows a tight interface between the stem and handlebar for more efficient load transfer while minimizing loads on the bolts. 3D forged EA50 aluminum ensures resilient strength. The Easton EA50 stem features a +/-8deg rise and 31.8mm clamp diameter.
short_description: This Easton EA50 stem delivers a sturdy, stable interface thanks to an optimized clamping interface and strong aluminum construction, all at a great value.
